name: Pasta
recipe:
1. Boil pasta until al dente.
2. Prepare sauce with tomatoes and cheese.
3. Add olive oil and simmer for 5 minutes.
4. Mix pasta with sauce and serve hot.

name: Omelette
recipe:
1. Beat eggs with salt.
2. Heat oil in pan and sauté onions.
3. Pour eggs and cook both sides.
4. Serve hot.

name: Salad
recipe:
1. Chop vegetables.
2. Mix in a bowl.
3. Drizzle lemon juice.
4. Toss and serve fresh.

name: Fried Rice
recipe:
1. Cook rice.
2. Scramble eggs, set aside.
3. Stir-fry veggies.
4. Add rice, eggs, soy sauce.
5. Toss and serve.

name: Grilled Cheese
recipe:
1. Butter bread slices.
2. Place cheese between slices.
3. Grill until golden.
4. Serve warm.

name: Pancakes
recipe:
1. Mix flour, milk, egg, sugar.
2. Heat butter on pan.
3. Pour batter, cook until bubbles.
4. Flip and cook.
5. Serve with syrup.

name: Tomato Soup
recipe:
1. Boil tomatoes, onion, garlic.
2. Blend smooth.
3. Add water, salt.
4. Simmer 10 mins.
5. Serve hot.

name: Chocolate Cake
recipe:
1. Mix dry ingredients.
2. Add eggs, butter.
3. Bake 180°C, 30 mins.
4. Cool and serve.

name: Chicken Curry
recipe:
1. Fry onions till golden.
2. Add spices, cook.
3. Add chicken, tomatoes.
4. Cook till tender.
5. Garnish and serve.

name: Fruit Smoothie
recipe:
1. Add all ingredients to blender.
2. Blend smooth.
3. Serve chilled.

name: Vegetable Soup
recipe:
1. Chop veggies.
2. Boil with water, salt.
3. Simmer 15 mins.
4. Serve hot.

name: Pizza
recipe:
1. Spread sauce on base.
2. Add cheese, veggies.
3. Bake till cheese melts.
4. Slice and serve.

name: Idli
recipe:
1. Soak rice, dal overnight.
2. Grind smooth.
3. Ferment overnight.
4. Steam in moulds.
5. Serve with chutney.

name: Dosa
recipe:
1. Make dosa batter.
2. Heat pan, spread thin.
3. Drizzle oil, cook crisp.
4. Serve hot.

name: Biryani
recipe:
1. Cook rice 70%.
2. Fry onions, tomatoes, spices.
3. Add marinated chicken.
4. Layer with rice.
5. Cook 20 mins on low.
6. Serve with raita.

name: Paratha
recipe:
1. Knead dough.
2. Roll out parathas.
3. Cook on pan with oil.
4. Serve with curry.

name: Upma
recipe:
1. Roast semolina.
2. Fry onions, chili.
3. Add water, salt.
4. Add semolina, stir till fluffy.

name: Poha
recipe:
1. Wash poha.
2. Fry onions, potato, spices.
3. Add poha, mix.
4. Garnish with coriander.

name: Chapati
recipe:
1. Knead dough.
2. Roll into discs.
3. Cook both sides on hot pan.
4. Serve with curry.

name: Fish Fry
recipe:
1. Marinate fish with spices.
2. Shallow fry until golden.
3. Serve with lemon wedges.

name: Dal Tadka
recipe:
1. Cook lentils.
2. Prepare onion-tomato masala.
3. Add tadka of ghee, spices.
4. Mix and serve.

name: Samosa
recipe:
1. Make dough.
2. Cook spiced potato-pea filling.
3. Shape samosas, fill.
4. Deep fry till golden.

name: Burger
recipe:
1. Toast buns.
2. Place patty, cheese, veggies.
3. Assemble burger.
4. Serve with fries.

name: Sandwich
recipe:
1. Butter bread slices.
2. Add cheese, cucumber, tomato.
3. Close and serve.

name: Spring Rolls
recipe:
1. Cook veggies with soy sauce.
2. Fill sheets, roll tight.
3. Deep fry until crisp.

name: French Fries
recipe:
1. Cut potatoes into sticks.
2. Fry in hot oil until golden.
3. Sprinkle salt, serve hot.

name: Pulao
recipe:
1. Fry onion, spices.
2. Add veggies, rice.
3. Cook with water till done.
4. Serve with raita.

name: Pav Bhaji
recipe:
1. Cook mashed veggies with spices.
2. Toast pav with butter.
3. Serve together with onions.

name: Chole
recipe:
1. Cook chickpeas.
2. Fry onion, tomato, spices.
3. Add chickpeas.
4. Simmer and serve.

name: Rajma
recipe:
1. Cook beans.
2. Fry onion, tomato, spices.
3. Add beans, simmer.
4. Serve with rice.

name: Masala Dosa
recipe:
1. Prepare potato filling.
2. Spread dosa on pan.
3. Add filling inside.
4. Fold and serve.

name: Vada Pav
recipe:
1. Place vada in bun.
2. Add chutney.
3. Serve with fried chilies.

name: Pani Puri
recipe:
1. Fill puris with potato, chickpeas.
2. Dip in spiced water.
3. Eat immediately.

name: Kheer
recipe:
1. Boil rice in milk.
2. Add sugar, cardamom.
3. Cook till thick.
4. Garnish with nuts.

name: Gulab Jamun
recipe:
1. Knead khoya, flour.
2. Shape balls.
3. Fry golden, dip in sugar syrup.
4. Serve warm.

name: Jalebi
recipe:
1. Make fermented batter.
2. Pipe into hot oil in spirals.
3. Fry crisp.
4. Dip in sugar syrup.

name: Rasgulla
recipe:
1. Curdle milk, strain chenna.
2. Knead and shape balls.
3. Boil in sugar syrup.
4. Serve chilled.

name: Halwa
recipe:
1. Roast semolina in ghee.
2. Add water, sugar.
3. Stir until thick.
4. Serve hot.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
recipe:
1. Fry tomato puree with spices.
2. Add butter, cream.
3. Add paneer cubes.
4. Cook and serve with naan.

name: Palak Paneer
recipe:
1. Boil and puree spinach.
2. Fry onion, tomato, spices.
3. Add paneer, spinach.
4. Cook and serve.

name: Aloo Gobi
recipe:
1. Fry onion, spices.
2. Add potato, cauliflower.
3. Cook till tender.
4. Serve with roti.

name: Bhindi Masala
recipe:
1. Fry okra separately.
2. Cook onion, tomato, spices.
3. Mix okra.
4. Serve with chapati.

name: Mushroom Curry
recipe:
1. Fry onion, tomato, spices.
2. Add mushrooms.
3. Cook till tender.
4. Serve hot.

name: Egg Curry
recipe:
1. Boil eggs, peel.
2. Fry onion, tomato, spices.
3. Add eggs, simmer.
4. Serve with rice.

name: Momos
recipe:
1. Make dough.
2. Prepare veg filling.
3. Shape momos.
4. Steam till cooked.

name: Shawarma
recipe:
1. Cook marinated chicken.
2. Fill pita with chicken, veggies, sauce.
3. Roll and serve.

name: Tacos
recipe:
1. Cook chicken with spices.
2. Fill taco shells with chicken, lettuce, cheese.
3. Top with salsa.
4. Serve immediately.

name: Sushi
recipe:
1. Cook sushi rice.
2. Place on nori sheet.
3. Add fillings, roll tight.
4. Cut into pieces and serve.

name: Nachos
recipe:
1. Layer chips on plate.
2. Add cheese, jalapenos.
3. Microwave until melted.
4. Serve with salsa.
